Let's look back on the year 2022!

What?

March.
March.

I got a reply.

How many are buried?

This...

You're ordering it?
Yes, I've been ordering it, and it's my favorite.
I like the pudding-like texture with a crunchy texture and soft inside.
I like the pudding-like texture.
I think it's the ultimate.
I know.
I'll eat it.
It's so good!

It's pudding inside.

It's good.
Yeah, it's good.

It's so good in there.
It's so good.

It's delicious.
How many packages have you eaten, by the way?
By the way, how many have you eaten this year?
I bet you've eaten a hundred.

I'll see you later.

Wait a minute.

We had to make a video for the survey.

The eyebrows are set to the darkest setting.
Is there such a thing?

I took the photo in that state and sent it without realizing it.

On live TV.

That's scary.

I saw it.

I thought something had happened.
I mean... the manager...

I didn't get any comments from the audience or the MCs.
Even the fans didn't comment on it.

The three of us are doing it.

But I don't know... I've had a lot of eyebrow jobs...

It's on top of my eyebrows.

I'll be careful.
That's pretty urgent, isn't it?
You're right, it's funny.

Last year, me, Kazuki Mukai, and Nawa Yumiki...
Me, Kazuki Mukai, and Nawa Yumiki starred in a drama together.
Something like that?
That's right.
We were filming at school.
I was supposed to join the filming later, but they would get mad at me, so I ran to the set as fast as I could.
So I ran to the set and said good morning.
There was some kind of pit.
I got stuck in one of the pits and got seriously injured.
Wait a minute... what kind of situation is that?
It's not a surprise.
It's a natural pit.
It was Nawa Yumiki, right?
I've been told I look like I work at a construction site.
I don't think so.
Not at all.
I don't think so.
Dramas have connections, don't they?
I was in uniform, so my knees are showing.
I didn't know what to do.
But it just so happened that I played a character who was getting dv'd.
Oh!
That's why we connected so well.
I didn't have to hurt him.
That's how we connected.
That's right.
You're all dv'd on your knees.
Knees, knees, knees...
Don't go for the knees, don't go for the knees, don't go for the knees.
It's for the sake of connection.
But in this drama, Hazuki and I both have knee injuries.
And Hazuki got called in by the director.
I didn't want to get mad at her, so I ran towards her.
Then she thought she'd get mad and ran too fast.
I fell down.
And then she came out with a boom.
And then the female supervisor got mad at me.
What the hell kind of move is that?
I told her that it would make the drama unconnected.
I wasn't the one getting dv'd.
What kind of role is that?
What kind of leading lady are you?
Three sisters with dirty knees.
Next...
This one caught my attention.
What's this all about?
I'm close with my family and we often make video calls.
My brother was about to start his freshman year of high school in April.
I congratulated him and wished him good luck.
But now that he's gone, my father and I were talking on the phone.
He started talking about my brother's aging.
He's a really nice guy.
And my dad started saying...
That's amazing.
He's a really good kid.
He said he was a really good kid when he was a little kid.
I was telling him about how he was a really good kid when he was little, and he started acting weird.
His face didn't look so good anymore.
He's so cute.
His face would fall off.
I thought he was crying, and I started crying, too.
We hid it from each other.
But you can hear it in her voice.
I mean, I'd be shaking.
He's a good guy, right?
I heard it from my grandmother.
My grandmother.
You have a grandfather too?
My grandmother told me stories about my brother when he was little.
It's really hot.
You didn't record that?
No.
Why don't you have it on tape?
I'm pretty sure I didn't.
But he was a really nice kid.
He was about four years old.
He was just a friend of mine, so my parents...
We used to spend a lot of time at my grandma's house.
And he was about four years old, and...
When grandma came home from shopping at night
She would usually say, "Welcome home.
A four year old says, "You must be tired, Grandma.
"You must be tired, Grandma.
What can I say?
That's too much of a turn-off for me.
That's just the beginning.
That episode.
She's a good girl.
She's a good kid, but...
But I thought he was pretty straight-laced growing up.
Did you grow up straight?
I'm so happy.

I said I'd go over to their house after work.

Yuna-chan called her mother and told her I was there.
